title: CryptSafe
author: CryptSafe
content: My country people, I hail una. Una don hear say "CBN Set to Close Millions of Bank Accounts in GTB, Access, Zenith, First Bank, and Others" for your information, Dem say na people wey never link their account with their bvn naim this policy go affect because CBN feel say them no want to go by the law so anytime from now say make Nigerians wey never Link their account to their bvn dey ready because them go close the accounts them.Another reason wey then cite be say those accounts holders them wey no want to link their accounts fit dey use am do fraud wey dey make government agencies no dey fit trace them so e go dey very difficult for them to catch them so to avoid that saga CBN Dem say those accounts them go close am.So my people if una get any of una family members or friends wey never link their account based on say Dem forget abeg make una tell Dem to go do the needful make those CBN niggas no collect their bar o dey Yan opata o. These period no be wetin person go dey hear story for him money and account.I say make drop this information here make we for know. Una weldone.https://goldennewsng.com/cbn-set-to-close-millions-of-bank-accounts-in-gtb-access-zenith-first-bank-and-others-see-reasons/amp/

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: I think say CBN don close bank accounts wey no they linked to any BVN tay tay oh, i they surprised say na now them wan do am, i know see any reason why person no go wan get BVN and link it to their bank account, except na because of ignorance, but if no be that one e fit be say the person they use the account for fraud and money laundering, na BVN they help the CBN to curb fraud somewhat easily in the banking sector, so for people wey never do this, make them go link their BVN to their bank account before CBN close am down.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: I no understand this kind thing. I think sae the BVN connecting to bank mata don pass far tey. Every peso wey get existing bank account must get a BVN and without BVN, you no fit make use of your bank account. Na mandatory sae, opening a new bank account must require a BVN to do so. For this our country, I no sae there is nothing wey d impossible to happen. Em get some people wey go manage to maneuver the process of BVN link with their bank account. Anyway, I no d surprise for this kind thing to happen sha. As for those wey never link their bank account to BVN, make d hurry do am sha. As for me and my household our BVN is link with our bank account.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: This people matta even tire person self, since how many years wey them dey yan about BVN so them never still close people account? Haa!I remember since 2016 something like that wey them bin dey yan of close people account, this one come make us dey queue for line to make our BVN so that our account no go dey close down, the matta even surprised me say Government never still close those people account wey never link till today, then why all those pressure since 2016 dey panic like say e go just end within 30 days wey dem give us to submit our BVN. Na so e dy for the time of NIN every body dey run heter scatter in the name of say government wan ban all our line and make we also submit am to our bank as well but them no dey serious, i still believe say e get some people wey never even do their NIN, BVN. Oya look this our new money self, na so e happen kitikiti till today e come be say them don extend the money wahala. Why our government dey like to dey frustrate people like that? Omo their matta tire me abeg, make dem shift enter one corner make we rest focused on our blockchain matta.

comments.body: Now who dey confuse us with this issue on ground. Na CBN or bank because I fit remember say way back when this BVN matter arise,say if you no get BVN or fail to one to your account. Bank no go give you access to your funds for bank and because of this,I just abandon my account for GTB because of the stress that year since I get alt bank wey i register my BVN na just to link am. This make my funds for GTB almost impossible to collect. I still know say anybody wey one open bank acct,na BVN be first question wey customer care go ask you if you get before them ho give you form fill,and if you no get na BVN dem go do for you first. I no come understand this one way Emefiele dey come up with again when everybody wey e account dey active get BVN. Abi na the dormant account them CBN dey refer to.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: When I read the news sometime last week I was surprised to hear that there are still accounts that are operating in the Nigeria financial system without the BVN, isn't a BVN prerequisite to owning and operating an account?Reason why I like decentralized finance such as bitcoin and other altcoins that made up the cryptocurrency space since there is no third party like the bank its operation will be free and limited to proof of trust and stake, there is no limitation.But having to operate an account without a bank verification in a centralized financial institution will give room to a lot of criminality and fraud, reason why our banking systems are the pipeline to all the financial fraud in the world.

comments.body: I never know say this people still dey talk about this matter oo, but wait o, why dem still bring this matter come up again?them for leave this matter make people rest na since e be say everywhere don cool down like this, our country something no dey finished at all people wey dey really carry our money them no dey visit them or even block their account na just innocent poor citizens them go face they worry like say tomorrow no dey. Make we just reason our old mama them for village wea no fit move to go do the BVN how don wan carry do am.See ehh, if i be government officials i go like them to carry the BVN machine waka door to door for every village so that those people wey no fit meet up come go do am for their house, just the wey dem dey do census counting. if them begin to do things like that e go pure for people wey no fit go out or for those old people for we villages.
